about.title: About Us
about.p1: SYLC s.e.n.c. is a software development company.

home.informations: The waiting times between booking and the adoption can seem endless. Furrly allows the breeder to keep in touch with future owners and to send messages and photos while waiting for the big day.

p1.b1: An app that let people book animal reservations
p1.b2: A management and birth assignment system
p1.b3: A communication tool to keep track of the adoption process

reservation.title: Booking System
reservation.b1: Receive adoption requests directly through the app
reservation.b2: Communicate via Furrly with future owners
reservation.b3: Inform people in the waiting list about births and assigned the offspring to future owners

litter.title: Litter Management
litter.b1: As soon as your animal has given birth, register the newborns
litter.b2: Furrly will then allow you to assign future owners to each of the little ones
litter.b3: Keep a birth history to ensure a responsible birth cycle

album.title: Album and Profile
album.p1: The waiting times between booking, adoption and taking possession can seem endless. Furrly allows the breeder to keep in touch with future owners and to send messages and photos while waiting for the big day.
album.p2: We know that our four-legged friends are precious. Furrly will allow you to create a profile for each of your pets. You will be able to have quick access to all your photos and keep all these memories.

privacy.intro: Furrly manages the use of personal information pursuant to standards set forth in the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (S.C. 2000, c. 5) and the Act respecting the protection of personal information in the private sector (L.R.Q., c. P-39.1).

consent.b2: ensure compliance with the present terms of use; and
consent.b3: respond to your customer service requests.

photoGallery.title: Photo Gallery
photoGallery.p1: The application requires access rights to the camera and the device files to update the Photo Gallery. Unless explicitly shared, photos are only accessible by the owner. Photos are stored on Furrly’s servers and can be deleted individually or deleting all the information associated with the user account via a feature offered on the application web site.

onlineData.title: Online Data
onlineData.p1: The user profile stored online contains personal user information that is collected during the application registration and profile updates. A feature is provided on the application web site to delete all the information associated to a user account.

localFiles.title: Local Files
localFiles.p1: Some data is saved and stored locally on the user’s phone (some application preferences, images cache and others). It is not saved online. All local data is deleted when the user uninstalls the application.

security.title: Security
security.p1: The personal information we collect is kept in a secure environment. People having access to this data are required to respect the confidentiality of your information.
